title: Forged 2 hextech keys but they disappeared
body:
Hopefully someone can help me out. I had 7 key fragments and so I forged 2 keys using 6 of them at around 2:30am est on october 14th 2016. I realized as I the second key was forging that no new keys had appeared in the hextech inventory. Is there any way for me to get the 6 fragments back? Is this a known bug? I also used a championship jewel token afterward but it successfully gave me 2 new championship jewels so I don't think that the problem is just due to a some kind of lag in the client.

Any help or information would be greatly appreciated!!

replies.body: It sounds strange that your keys would just disappear, so I looked into this to find out what happened.  I do see that you crafted 2 keys from 6 fragments.  Your inventory does currently show you having 2 Hextech keys.  Are you still experiencing this issue?  If so, have you tried relogging yet in case of some sync or connection issue?  Let me know!
Thanks for getting back to me so soon! I've relogged in a few times since yesterday morning and also patched the small update that came out this evening but still no sign of the keys in my client :p

> [{quoted}](name=Lucky 77 Sevens,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=7bF5Q9kc,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-10-15T02:12:20.260+0000)
>
> Thanks for getting back to me so soon! I've relogged in a few times since yesterday morning and also patched the small update that came out this evening but still no sign of the keys in my client :p

That's really odd, but we'd like to help find out what's going on.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can check this out!  We'll respond as soon as we can!
